explains: v. 按优先顺序列出；优先考虑（处理）

sentences.en: The organization was formed to prioritize the needs of older people.
sentences.cn: 这个机构是为优先满足老年人的需要而成立的。

sentences.en: They did not always prioritize the protection of Mauna Kea's fragile ecosystems or its holiness to the islands' inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 他们并不总是优先考虑保护莫纳克亚脆弱的生态系统，或保护其对岛上居民的神圣地位。

sentences.en: Young people who are still getting started in life were more likely than older adults to prioritize personal fulfillment in their work.
sentences.cn: 生活仍在起步阶段的年轻人比老年人更有可能优先考虑工作中的个人成就感。
